bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, internal rear brake cable, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 20mm cone spacer and 20mm of spacers
New CompSet 6061 alloy, cone head bolt, 12-degree, 4-degree shim 31.8mm
Specialized Roubaix wrap w/ 2.5 gel pads
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible, 10-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Espoir Elite w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, aramid bead, 700x25c
Specialized Espoir Elite w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, aramid bead, 700x25c
Body Geometry Toupé Plus Comp, hollow Cr-Mo rails
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
